entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
